meaningMnemonic: You see a <radical>tree</radical> with a <radical>squid</radical> on it, so you get closer to <kanji>examine</kanji> it.
readingMnemonic: You're sticking your face in really, really close to <kanji>examine</kanji> this little squid in the tree when <reading>Ken</reading> (けん) the samurai appears behind you. "There you are, squid! Thank you citizen, I've been looking all over for my little chum."
